name: Trailblazers (itch)
description:
Lost in a dark forest with nothing but a torch, you must find your way through. My lighting the cauldrons found in the forest, you can light a path for yourself and other travelers. Burn away old boxes, grow plants and find a way through water with out letting your little flame die out.

Controls

A to move left, D to move right.

Space to Jump

E to use your torch on boxes and cauldrons

Q to grab

Z to restart the level

ESC to go back to the menu
